description:
Universal Media Server is a DLNA-compliant UPnP Media Server. It is capable of sharing video, audio and images between most modern devices.


Summary
This release adds a new Docker release built on Ubuntu which might improve stability, we will release it alongside the existing Alpine Linux releases for a while until we get feedback from you.
We updated our component library Mantine from v7 to v8 to improve our web interfaces, improved support for playlist files, improved UPnP support, improved performance in multiple ways, and fixed a lot of bugs. Please keep reporting them to us so we can fix them, and huge thanks to everyone who has.
Changes
General
- Added new Ubuntu Docker release which might improve stability, we will release both for a while until we get feedback from you
- Added support for updating album art objects via UPnP
- Improved stability of YouTube video playback
- Improved performance, especially of the web interfaces
- Fixed support for playlist files without headers (#5736) (thanks, @CyDragon80!)
- Fixed notifying renderers of new files before we parsed them
- Fixed videos sometimes not being parsed if they were added at the same time as 2 parent directories
- Fixed web player errors
- Fixed Recently Added folder missing videos
- Fixed order of videos in the Unwatched variant of the Recently Added folder
- Discontinued YouTube video support for Linux armhf (32-bit) release, because yt-dlp stopped supporting that architecture. You can still compile it for yourself.
Translation updates via Crowdin
- Czech (100%)
- Persian (43%) (thanks, Mehrshad Shafaghi Omam!)
Dependencies
- Bump @playwright/test from 1.54.2 to 1.55.0 (#5722)
- Bump @stylistic/eslint-plugin from 5.2.3 to 5.4.0 (#5752)
- Bump @vitejs/plugin-react from 4.7.0 to 5.0.2 (#5711, #5723)
- Bump actions/setup-java from 4 to 5 (#5716)
- Bump actions/setup-node from 4 to 5 (#5733)
- Bump axios from 1.11.0 to 1.12.2 (#5739, #5758)
- Bump com.github.oshi:oshi-core from 6.8.3 to 6.9.0 (#5756)
- Bump com.google.code.gson:gson from 2.13.1 to 2.13.2 (#5743)
- Bump com.google.guava:guava from 33.4.8-jre to 33.5.0-jre (#5754)
- Bump com.puppycrawl.tools:checkstyle from 11.0.0 to 11.0.1 (#5724)
- Bump com.zaxxer:HikariCP from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 (#5714)
- Bump de.sfuhrm:chromecast-java-api-v2 from 0.12.17 to 0.12.18 (#5755)
- Bump Mantine from 7.17.8 to 8.3.1
- Bump org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin from 3.14.0 to 3.14.1 (#5759)
- Bump org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-surefire-plugin from 3.5.3 to 3.5.4 (#5744)
- Bump org.eclipse.angus:angus-activation from 2.0.2 to 2.0.3 (#5745)
- Bump org.eclipse.jetty:jetty-client from 12.0.25 to 12.1.1 (#5713, #5742)
- Bump org.eclipse.jetty.ee10:jetty-ee10-servlet from 12.0.25 to 12.1.1 (#5713, #5742)
- Bump org.eclipse.jetty.ee10.websocket:jetty-ee10-websocket-jakarta-server from 12.0.25 to 12.1.1 (#5713, #5742)
- Bump org.eclipse.jetty.http2:jetty-http2-server from 12.0.25 to 12.1.1 (#5713, #5742)
- Bump org.jsoup:jsoup from 1.21.1 to 1.21.2 (#5715)
- Bump react-router-dom from 7.8.0 to 7.9.1 (#5757)
- Bump typescript-eslint from 8.38.0 to 8.43.0 (#5712, #5732, #5740)
- Bump video.js from 8.23.3 to 8.23.4 (#5741)
- Bump vite from 7.0.6 to 7.1.6 (#5731, #5735, #5753)
- Bump yt-dlp from 2025.08.20 to 2025.09.05
- Removed jackson-databind
- Removed yt-dlp for Linux armhf (32-bit), because they stopped making it. If you need it you will need to compile it yourself
